metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18640 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Alias feature in SnakeYAML before 1.26 allows entity expansion during a load operation, a related issue to CVE-2003-1564.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Upstream dispute this as a valid CVE - https://bitbucket.org/asomov/snakeyaml/issues/377/allow-configuration-for-preventing-billion#comment-55227358 - and they added a test-case for this type of attack of 2 years ago https://bitbucket.org/asomov/snakeyaml/commits/04378d05777d21d114a9cdc24976ad49c8919222 so this would appear to be a non-issue

criterions.comment: snakeyaml package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
